mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_table values( calendar_seq.nextval, #{id}, to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{allDay}, #{title}, #{backgroundColor}, #{borderColor} )
mapper.select: SELECT NO, id, startDate AS "start" , ENDDATE AS "end", allDay, title,backgroundColor , borderColor FROM calendar_table
